::Cleder::

"When we arrived the two most active attackers we saw were Depp and
McGowan. We did not know it at the time, but they are part of a gestalt
group, with Deemos' Maximals. Hot Rod fought Depp, and the rest of us
went after McGowan. They were helping some friends of theirs attack.
Also they said something about killing a Maximal traitor. It was us, the
Chivitons, and Shockwave and Unitron of the NDE against them and their
friends. McGowan, Depp, and the rest of them transformed to the gestalt,
Radistor, and soon headed towards Maximal City. Thats when I warned you.
We then found out that they were Maximals, and stoped fighting. Tempers
were high but Hot Rod defused the situation... for now. Currently Hot
Rod is talking with some bots at the Chiviton base. The gestalt group
and us are heading back," Cleder finished his report to IR.
